select p.id as "id" ,p.pre_value as "preValue" ,p.pre_type as "preType" ,date_format(p.created_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as "createdTime" ,p.creator_account as "creatorAccount" ,(select count(1) from tb_service_org o where o.business_type = p.id) as "orgNum" from tb_service_prefer p where p.record_status = '1' and p.pre_type = '0'
and p.pre_value like concat('%',#{preValue},'%')

select p.id as "id" ,p.pre_value as "preValue" ,p.pre_type as "preType" ,date_format(p.created_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as "createdTime" ,p.creator_account as "creatorAccount" ,(select count(1) from tb_service_org o where o.business_type = p.id) as "orgNum" from tb_service_prefer p where p.record_status = '1' and p.id = #{id}

SELECT p.id AS "p_id" ,p.pre_value AS "p_preValue" ,pr.product_id_ AS "pr_productId" ,pr.product_name AS "pr_productName" FROM (SELECT r.id, r.pre_value FROM tb_service_prefer r WHERE r.pre_type = '0' AND r.id != 'technology_finance' AND r.record_status = '1') p LEFT JOIN tb_service_product pr ON p.id = pr.signory_id AND ( pr.template_id IS NULL OR pr.template_id = '' ) AND pr.status = '1' AND pr.product_type = '0' AND pr.record_status = '1'
